page.title: 06The Youth Adventure Centre
page.content: The development of a Youth Adventure Centre in the old Officers Mess of the former Battle of Britain airfield, and the use of 9 acres of surrounding land,make this one of the major developments in the village. The centre has a capacity for 200 young people at any one time.Visitors come from all over the country and from the continent.The visitors use local facilities,Folkestone & District sporting facilities and visit local historic centres such as Canterbury Cathedral. It is still hoped that an Olympic sized swimming pool and running track will be built with facilities for other sports. Any facilities are available for local use. The Centre was officially opened by the Duke of Gloucester on Monday,May 20th,1985
